title: Tiny Yolo v2
description: Object detection model designed for fast processing
long_description: Tiny YOLOv2 is a real-time object detection model designed for fast processing, implemented in TensorFlow to run on PSOC(tm) Edge. The model has been trained on the COCO Person Dataset. It specifically detects persons in the frame, drawing a bounding box around them.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Deploy the pre-trained model to your PSOC™ Edge Eval Kit
